CustomField.formula: IF( ISPICKVAL(Case_Record_Types__c, 'Accident/Emergency'), 'Complaint', IF( ISPICKVAL(Case_Record_Types__c, 'IT Complaints'), 'Complaint', IF( ISPICKVAL(Case_Record_Types__c, 'Internal Issues'), 'Complaint', IF( ISPICKVAL(Case_Record_Types__c, 'Safety Issues'), 'Complaint', IF( ISPICKVAL(Case_Record_Types__c, 'Service Compliance'), 'Complaint', IF( ISPICKVAL(Case_Record_Types__c, 'Staff Behavior'), 'Complaint', IF( ISPICKVAL(Case_Record_Types__c, 'Theft'), 'Complaint', IF( ISPICKVAL(Case_Record_Types__c, 'Traffic Violation'), 'Complaint', IF( ISPICKVAL(Case_Record_Types__c, 'Add Service'), 'Enquiry', IF( ISPICKVAL(Case_Record_Types__c, 'Inquiry and Notices'), 'Enquiry', IF( ISPICKVAL(Case_Record_Types__c, 'Request'), 'Enquiry', IF( ISPICKVAL(Case_Record_Types__c, 'New Business'), 'Enquiry', IF( ISPICKVAL(Case_Record_Types__c, 'Cancel Services'), 'Service', IF( ISPICKVAL(Case_Record_Types__c, 'Financial Services'), 'Service', IF( ISPICKVAL(Case_Record_Types__c, 'Online Services'), 'Service', IF( ISPICKVAL(Case_Record_Types__c, 'Service Quality'), 'Service', IF( ISPICKVAL(Case_Record_Types__c, 'Feedback and Appreciation'), 'Feedback and appreciate', null)))))))))))))))))
CustomField.label: Case Type
